message_1:
What is the median of the following set of ages of 10 individuals? 

21, 32, 19, 27, 34, 31, 25, 29, 24, 28
message_2:
First, we need to arrange the ages in ascending order:

19, 21, 24, 25, 27, 28, 29, 31, 32, 34

Since there are 10 individuals (an even number), the median will be the average of the two middle numbers. In this case, the middle numbers are 27 and 28.

The median is (27 + 28) / 2 = 55 / 2 = 27.5.
